text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
In my formative years, I lacked the<n>"will" that my peers
exhibited. I simply<n>took instructions and carried them out.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Everything changed when I<n>encountered the G1 races. For
the first<n>time in my existence, I felt what it<n>was like to
"yearn" for something.

text_block_list.name: Young Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Father... I... I want to be a Triple<n>Crown champion.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon's Father
text_block_list.text: ...You—I... I see. Their running style<n>caught your eye, huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My father is a stoic man, but on that<n>day I vividly remember
observing a<n>smile.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon's Father
text_block_list.text: Let's do it, Bourbon. For the Triple<n>Crown!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
That goal was one of the few choices<n>I've ever made that
truly reflected my<n>"will." My dad and I treasured it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...This concludes the memory log. I<n>trust that sharing this
information with<n>you will aid in your comprehension of<n>me.

It's been a few days since I've<n>become Mihono
Bourbon's trainer.<n>During our downtime, she shares bits<n>
and pieces of her past with me.

Her story continues to inspire me—a<n>cyborg-like girl with
hopes and<n>dreams hidden under her mechanical<n>facade.
choice_data_list: Together, let's make your dreams come true.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Certainly.

The corners of the trainee's lips<n>move upwards into a small
smile.

Slowly but surely, we continue to<n>make progress. But as
word of our<n>training gets out, people begin to<n>approach me
with remarks of<n>disappointment.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
What?! Mihono Bourbon's training<n>for long distances?
That's such a<n>waste though! She should just stick<n>with
sprinting!

Letting the comments fall on deaf<n>ears, we march on and
continue<n>training for the Triple Crown. The<n>skepticism only
strengthens our<n>resolve to prove everyone wrong.

Mihono Bourbon is going to show the<n>world what she's
made of.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Your recommendation is... the Tracen<n>Meet's 2,000-meter
turf race? The<n>distance is comparable to the longest<n>
junior G1 race, the Hopeful Stakes.

The Tracen Meet—a highly anticipated<n>school event with
numerous races.<n>The fierce competition attracts<n>countless
spectators.
choice_data_list: That's right! We're taking first place!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. Processing new directive.
And with that, our preparations for the<n>meet begin.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(1,600 meters completed. 400 meters<n>remaining. Heart rate
and oxygen<n>intake are within optimal parameters.)
choice_data_list:
Come on, let's beat your best time! You got
this!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Roger that!

Gritting her teeth, Mihono Bourbon<n>bolts across the track
like the wind.

The day of the Tracen Meet arrives.<n>Throngs of people
gather, eager to<n>catch a glimpse of one<n>student—Mihono
Bourbon.

Ever since the news of her switch to<n>long races broke out,
the racer has<n>become a hot topic.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I can't imagine her running 2,000<n>meters—she doesn't have
the stamina<n>for it!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
This race will be tough to watch.<n>Honestly, what on earth is
her trainer<n>thinking?

Praying for Mihono Bourbon's<n>success, I fix my eyes on
the starting<n>gates.
Bang!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Aaaand we're off! Who will take first<n>place in today's
2,000-meter turf<n>race?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(Acquired favorable position.<n>Preparing to accelerate. All
systems<n>functioning at maximum efficiency.)

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
...How the heck is Mihono Bourbon<n>keeping up with
everyone?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon takes the lead!<n>Rounding the 4th corner,
she's on<n>fire—but wait! The other runners are<n>closing in
fast on her as we approach<n>the last stretch!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume
text_block_list.text: This is it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mihono Bourbon has lost her lead!<n>With just one-hundred
meters<n>remaining, will she catch up in time?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(One racer ahead, two close behind.<n>Stamina reserves are
rapidly<n>depleting. Detecting lung distress.<n>Concentration
faltering. But I...)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Must win!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Four Umamusume are fighting tooth<n>and nail for the lead as
they approach<n>the end! Who will take first?!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

The crowd is on the edge of their<n>seats as the racers
charge across the<n>finish line. Everyone holds their<n>breath,
waiting for the caster to<n>announce the results.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The winner is—MIHONO BOURBON!<n>MIHONO BOURBON!

Amazed, the once-skeptical trainers<n>now look at her with
wonder and<n>incredulity.

text_block_list.name: New Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Who knew she could run 2,000<n>meters like that? I'm taking
my words<n>back about Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Looks like we've got a new<n>contender for medium events
now!

Today, Mihono Bourbon has made a<n>name for herself as a
formidable<n>Triple Crown challenger.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Placing first in a 2,000-meter race with<n>such little stamina...
Well, I'll be<n>damned.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: You really are one heck of a runner,<n>Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Mission accomplished. As per our<n>agreement, I have
emerged victorious<n>in the 2,000-meter turf race.

Mihono Bourbon joins me in the<n>stands, exuding her usual<n>
calm-and-collected demeanor despite<n>the taxing race.

That today's results were the<n>culmination of grit and
perseverance.

In the end, hard work surpasses<n>talent—there's no doubt
about it. I<n>open my mouth to remind her, only to<n>find
myself choking back a sob.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've detected a shift in your emotional<n>state as
characterized by erratic<n>breathing and facial muscle<n>
contortions. However, the cause is<n>unknown.
choice_data_list:
The way you run inspires courage in others... I'm
so proud of you.

The way you run inspires courage in others... I'm
so proud of you.

text_block_list.text:
I tell her that I want her to continue to<n>prove that hard work
surpasses<n>talent. Her usually robotic eyes widen<n>slightly
in response.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I ran only to achieve my goal. Evoking<n>an "emotional"
response is not<n>currently logged as one of my<n>objectives.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However... given the source of the<n>comment, I will take it
into<n>consideration.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I have updated my objectives. They<n>now include the
Twinkle Series, the<n>Classic Triple Crown, and showing<n>the
value of hard work.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
My calculations show that there will<n>be challenges ahead of
us, but none<n>too hard to overcome with your<n>presence.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Once again, I look forward to continue<n>working with you,
Fathe—Trainer.

For a moment, the racer's stoic<n>expression crumbles as her
cheeks<n>redden. Although it's just a verbal<n>slip, I can't
help but feel that we're<n>getting closer.
